responses: 0: Virtually no women enjoy full freedom of movement (e.g., North Korea or Afghanistan under
1: Some women enjoy full freedom of movement, but most do not (e.g., Apartheid South
2: Most women enjoy some freedom of movement but a sizeable minority does not. Alternatively all women enjoy partial freedom of movement.
3: Most women enjoy full freedom of movement but a small minority does not.
4: Virtually all women enjoy full freedom of movement.
citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
question: Do women enjoy freedom of movement within the country?
name: v2cldmovew, *_osp, *_ord
